--0-354590024-1071857938=:10249
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

The mayday could not be picked up do to the global communications jamm that was currently in effect. The Maximal sensors had picked up the ships decent, but noone had noticed since the Maximals were defending their base from Unicron's Minions.

shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@...> wrote:OOC:  I thank you

BIC:
StarFlier woke up to a dawn unlike she had ever seen.  The sky was 
brilliant oranges and reds.  She got up, tansformed into bot mode and 
set about making her ship a little more livable.  She found her small 
tool kit and started working on fixing the emergency power cells, but 
they were too far damaged.  She did find her distress beacon.  She 
pressed it and hoped someday, someone might find her. It gave out a 
general MAYDAY. But no allience signals. 

She cleaned up most of the rubble and made a pile of scrap outside 
the ship.  Next, she went to the console.  Th best she could manage 
was fixing her chair.  She sat in it and propped her feet up. She put 
her hands behind her head and leaned back.  
"Yeah, it won't be so bad here. A few curtains, a little paint, this 
might be down right cozy."  with sarcasm dripping off her tongue.
